name: 2022 7th International Conference on Food and Environmental Sciences
content: All ICFES 2022 accepted papers will be published in the: Option A-Environment Topic:International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec,et al. Option B-Food Topic International Journal about Food, and all papers will be included in the Engineering & Technology Digital Library, and indexed by WorldCat, Google Scholar, Cross ref, ProQuest, CABI.
